Title: NETMESSAGE:Biological labs research documents found !
Translation: 找到了生化实验室的研究资料！

Title: NETMESSAGE:They're crazy ! They create those... things !!\nWell, we have to do our job, and protect their work !\n
Translation: 他们疯了！他们创造了这些...怪物！！\n我们得履行我们的职责，保护他们的工作成果！\n

Title: NETMESSAGE:We have some guys trapped inside\nand no more information about the situation
Translation: 有些倒霉的家伙被困在里面了\n汇报完毕，所有情报就这些了。

Title: NETMESSAGE:Good luck men, we're staying here\nto secure the area !
Translation: 祝你好运！我们就留在这儿守住这片区域了

Title: NETMESSAGE:You have to enter the labs and save the NP's research files\nbefore the army is warned and kill all of us !
Translation: 你得在敌人发现我们，把我们都杀了之前进入实验室，保护NP的研究文件！

Title: NETMESSAGE:This thing... It's trying to control my... mind...
Translation: 这怪物...它在控制我的...大脑！

Title: NETMESSAGE:This generator need gazoline !
Translation: 这台发电机需要汽油才能工作！
